name: Hope (itch) (Naeldream)
description: The forest once were a peaceful place, but one day, a creature called Melancholy took the control of it, drowning out the lights of the Holy braziers created to seal her away. The forest was fade into darkness. Until at last, a young hero appear: a little girl named Hope, carrying in his hands, a mystic lantern capable to bring back the light. But the mad queen send after her her troops, her mournful hands. Will she accomplish her destiny and bring back joy to the forest?
